scripts.build:stable: cross-env ECOS_ENV=stable NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.build:test: cross-env ECOS_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.build:deploy:stable: npm run build:stable && npm run deploy:stable
scripts.build:deploy:test: npm run build:test && npm run deploy:test
scripts.build:deploy:noodltest: npm run build:test && npm run deploy:noodltest
scripts.start:test: cross-env ECOS_ENV=test USE_DEV_PATHS=true npm run start
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r jsdom-global/register -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --extensions ts --file src/setupTests.ts --watch --watch-files src src/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r jsdom-global/register -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --extensions ts --file src/setupTests.ts --watch --watch-files src
scripts.test:noodlui: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-ui "npm run test"
scripts.test:noodlui:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-ui "npm run test:file"
scripts.test:noodlui:internal: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --reporter mochawesome -r jsdom-global/register -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --extensions ts --file ./src/setupTests.ts --watch --watch-files packages/noodl-ui/src
scripts.test:noodluidom: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui-dom/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-ui-dom "npm run test"
scripts.test:actionchain: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-ui "npm run test:file src/__tests__/ActionChain.test.ts"
scripts.test:components: cross-env NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-ui "npm run test:file src/__tests__/*Component*.test.ts"
scripts.test:coverage:components: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test nyc ts-mocha -r jsdom-global/register -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register --require source-map-support/register --extensions ts --file ./src/setupTests.ts "packages/noodl-ui/src/__tests__/*(*Component|noodl-ui).test.ts"
scripts.test:noodlutils: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-utils "npm run test"
scripts.test:noodlutils:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="packages/noodl-ui/tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test lerna exec --scope noodl-utils "npm run test:file"
scripts.lib:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_DEV_PATHS=true lerna run --parallel start
scripts.lib:utils: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_DEV_PATHS=true lerna run --parallel --ignore noodl-ui --ignore noodl-ui-dom start -- --watch
